attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Currently activated panel (In accordion mode, the binding value type must be String. Otherwise, the binding value type is array.)

attrs.name: accordion
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: before-close
attrs.desc: Do not close the folding panel.

events.name: change
events.desc: Triggered when the current active panel changes. (In accordion mode, the type of activeNames is String. Otherwise, the type of activeNames is array.)
